ygData.subject: Re: Hey guys!
ygData.msgSnippet: hey Freddy ! sup. long time no hear. bibi aka yiyang ... From: Freddy Cheng  To:  Date: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
hey Freddy ! sup.
long time no hear.


bibi aka yiyang

-----Original Message-----
From: Freddy Cheng <sccheng@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, October 28, 1999 9:28 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Hey guys!


>From: "Freddy Cheng" <sccheng@...>
>
>Hey guys,
>just letting u guys know if u all interested in coming to AC let me know...
>i will be on World Harvestgain! with the name Silverhand Fred...
>
>cheers,
>Fred
>p/s : at least theres no such thing as camping in AC.

>> Message: 1
>> Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 02:36:06 +0800
>> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>> Subject: Fw: I have quit Everquest
>>
>>
>> ----- Original Message -----
>> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>> Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 17:26
>> Subject: I have quit Everquest
>>
>>
>> > Hi all,
>> > Dued to my failure at PoF which got alot of ppl into trouble
>> (which
>> > involved dying and losing the major portion of their stuff) and with
>> little
>> > else to do (except like camping for stuff, which I have gotten very
sick
>> and
>> > tired of), I have cancelled my account as from today, Oct 26th 1999.
>Zand,
>> > please give out the items to the people as I have listed down with you.
>> > Especially Weadaenye, whom I'm guilty as hell to got her into a living
>> hell.
>> >
>> > Please help me tell the follow people of my quiting and hope to
>> see
>> > them again sometime on another game another time and Best wishes to
>them.
>> >
>> > Daedor, Aildiin, Iyenya, Ironbuket, Hoppy, Kitiarra, Stella,
>> > Saintly, Valadine, Millie, Silph, Lunatictiara, Ader, Fost, Sparrow,
>> > Demitry, Wlyven, Anima and Nismo/Volk (they are brothers sharing the
>same
>> > account).
>> >
>> > Everquest was, had been and enjoyable game at the beginning but
>> due
>> > to the way that the game is designed it reminds me more of Evercamp,
>> > Everbitch etc etc. It has become a torture to enter the "game" each day
>> now.
>> > This incident has at least freed me from Evercrack as some would say it
>> is.
>> > So farewell my fellow guildmates. And may your time in Everquest be as
>> your
>> > first day, with new and exciting adventures each day.
>> >
>> > Garren The Broken Paladin.
>> >
>>
>>
>>
>>

>> Message: 3
>> Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 08:11:41 +0800
>> From: "Zand" <hannibal@...>
>> Subject: Re: Fw: I have quit Everquest
>>
>> Hello Garren,
>>
>> A few quick questions.
>>
>> 1. Have you acutally cancelled your EQ a/c? So you're absolutely sure
>you're
>> not coming back ever?
>> If that is the case, i will distribute your stuff sooner than 1 week but
>> only if you confirm here
>> that you will absolutely not return anymore.
>>
>> 2. You put a Luna on my list and i have only seen a Lunatictiara on who
so
>> far...
>> is this the same Luna you want to give your Rubicite Helm to? Kindly
>> confirm..
>>
>> 3. Will you be on this mailint list still or are you also going to cancel
>> the subscription?
>>
>>
>> I guess that's it for my questions. I wish you'd change your mind friend
>but
>> I understand your
>> feelings. Perhaps it really takes one real nasty experience to get ppl
off
>> EQ even when
>> they have been thinking about it for awhile. I experienced it when
camping
>> Jboots 12 hrs
>> and then getting "voted" out of the queue by some selfish asses after i
>fell
>> asleep for awhile
>> despite having done most of the killing and work and having been in first
>> position 4 hrs.
>> I still will have my revenge! Heh...
>>
>>
>> I wish you all the best Garren be it in another MMORPG in future or in
>real
>> life.
>> But most important of all you get to enjoy your REAL life now =)
>> Not the alternate one we've been wasting time on hehe..Evercrack it is!
>>
>> Best Regards,
>> Zand
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>

>> Message: 4
>> Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 09:47:12 +0800
>> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>> Subject: Re: Fw: I have quit Everquest
>>
>> DOH,
>>
>> Please stay. Play a druid ....until a new game is out.....but then
>agin..its
>> probably a good reason to leave EQ...
>>
>> Thx for alll your assists in the early days where there's only a few of
us
>> local kakis (3 i think) in Innorruk. i was a monk then and u gave me a
>> earring and some gp.
>>
>> Hope u change your mind. Go take a 1 month break and come back in .
>>
>> let us know the next game u be in. our guild should still grp in another
>> time ..another place.....
>>
>> Cya Paldine aka Garren aka Gary.
>>
>> be well
>>
>> YiYang
>> BiBi
>> Alex
>>

>> Message: 5
>> Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 09:28:08 +0800
>> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> Subject: RE: Fw: I have quit Everquest
>>
>> Err, I was thinking of quiting also, but didnt expect u to quit earlier
>> than me. EQ has turn out to be such a zombie-camping-training game that
>> eliminated most of the fun provided by the multi-race/class char
>> development concept.
>>
>> To tell the truth, even after I stop playing EQ, I didn't login UO every
>> night. But every time I login, there are quite a lot of stuffs I can do,
>> other than camping/hunting. Both UO and EQ are not as attractive as b4,
>> but it's sad that say EQ has more 'push' factor than UO. I feel more
sick
>> when thinking of logging into EQ than UO ;)
>>
>> Ziltus
>>
>> p/s: Garren shld have sold ya acct in eBay instead of just quit. Who
>> know, with ya chars, you can earn some money to buy some new PC stuffs,
>> hehe.
>>

>> Message: 6
>> Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 16:11:30 +0800
>> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>> Subject: Re: Fw: I have quit Everquest
>>
>> Don't you think this is a bit rashed? I chao chao also have endure EQ for
>nearly
>> 2 years now and stil manage to tahan the camping etc..... by NOT camping
>for
>> items unless friends are camping or if soloing for XP, spam guildsay or
>talk
>> cock with other people.
>>
>> They way with EQ is as you say level level level then at 50 camp items
>blah blah
>> blah, but you can do other things like run around the various karana
>plains and
>> admire the sight or enter a low level dungeon and help newbies survive,
>else if
>> you everday camp item also can go gila.
>>
>> You can also do the long boring quest that eq has, heck, if you want to
>kill
>> Lucan, just send a tell and I help take 1 HT from him before dying......
>>
>> Else do the most common thing people do when they are sick of EQ,
restart!
>This
>> time around, go more slowly, wait for kakis to join up, play a diferent
>class,
>> go to other hunting grounds you have never hunt in before. This will make
>it
>> slightly more enjoyable and is a good chance to meet up with new people.
>>
>> The over level 30 population in Inno is now at at all time low with you
>> leaving....... Once either Zan, FF or Merns leave, I better pack up and
>zhao as
>> well.....
>>
>> Bottomline, get your arse back into EQ and slave with the rest of
>us........ and
>> if you do return, don't play for so long, play for shorter periods and
>forcus
>> more of fun and interaction.
>>
>> Fesse Estasis, Cleric who is working on her KOS faction.
>>
